Author: hollyyykryan
Text: Figure out your BMI/TDEE and use that as a basis. I would suggest upping your calorie intake a little more each day to make sure you're comfortable and won't go into a binge phase or freak out. If you're going to exercise, don't focus so much on cardio (burning fat) but rather strength building exercises

Author: Daisyroads
Text: Find a TDEE calculator it should tell you maintenance calories. If not start by increasing your calories by 10% and see how your body reacts. Best of luck!
